values.text: Great! Let me brief you a little about your job role.

Software developers have to do with the programs they work with and what they're trying to create. Web developers are mainly concerned with websites and web applications that run on internet browsers, while software developers are more focused on computer programs for desktop and mobile devices.
Software developers mainly deal with both back-end and front-end, whereas, Web developers mainly deal with only front-end of any application/websites.
Did this sound interesting and informative for you?
Great! Let me brief you a little about your role in the company.

As a Manager of the company, you are responsible for planning, directing and overseeing the operations and fiscal health of a business unit, division, department, or an operating unit within an organization. You are responsible for overseeing and leading the work of a group of people in many instances.
Does this sound interesting to you?
Great! Let me brief you a little about your job role in the company.

As a DevOps Engineer, you are IT professionals who collaborate with software developers, system operators and other IT staff members to manage code releases. You cross and merge the barriers that exist between software development, testing and operations teams and keep existing networks in mind as they design, plan and test.

options.label: A DevOps Engineer is expected to test, build, design, deploy, and maintain continuous integration and continuous delivery processes using tools like Jenkins, Maven, Git, etc.
A DevOps Engineer must understand all the best tools and technologies, and when the time comes he/she should be able to choose the best one that best fits the business requirements.
A DevOps Engineer must possess the ability to automate, test, and deploy the code and monitor it.

A DevOps Engineer needs to work in close coordination with the development and operations teams such that the application is in line with the expected performance according to the customer’s requirement.

values.text: Does this sound interesting to you
Great! Let me brief a little about your role in the company.

As a Machine Learning Engineer, your responsibilities include designing and developing machine learning and deep learning systems. Running machine learning tests and experiments. Implementing appropriate ML algorithms. Machine learning engineers feed data into models defined by data scientists. They're also responsible for taking theoretical data science models and helping scale them out to production-level models that can handle terabytes of real-time data.

Machine learning engineers, design self-running software to automate predictive models. Each time the software performs an operation, it uses those results to carry out future operations with a greater degree of accuracy. This is how the software, or machine, “learns.”
Does this sound interesting to you?
Great! Let me brief you a little about your job role in the company.

As a Finance/Sales person, your job is reviewing financial reports, monitoring accounts, and preparing activity reports and financial forecasts. Financial managers also investigate ways to improve profitability, and analyze markets for business opportunities, such as expansion, mergers or acquisitions.

input.text: making payments and keeping the bills paid
make sure everyone gets paid (including the government)
preparing financial reports, e.g. P&L, Balance sheets and budgets
to avoid errors, fraud and theft

values.text: Does this sound interesting to you?
Great! Let me brief you a little about your role in the company.

As a HR or Talent Acquisition Head/Specialist , you have to coordinate with hiring managers to identify staffing needs. Determining selection criteria. Sourcing potential candidates through online channels (e.g. social platforms and professional networks.)

As a Public Relations Officer, you are responsible for developing PR strategies and campaigns. Preparing press releases, keynote speeches and promotional material. Building positive relationships with stakeholders, media and the public. Public relations (PR) is about managing reputation. A career in PR involves gaining understanding and support for your clients, as well as trying to influence opinion and behavior. You'll use all forms of media and communication to build, maintain and manage the reputation of your clients.

options.label: Develop a sustainable talent acquisition and hiring plans and strategies
Design, plan and execute employer branding activities
Encourage employees to be brand ambassadors
Use Recruitment Marketing tools. Use sourcing methods for hard-to-fill roles
Source and find candidates qualified for open positions
perform analysis of hiring needs and provide employee hiring forecast
Design, plan and execute selection processes (conduct interviews and screening calls, administer psychological tests etc.)
Reviews employment applications and background check reports.Find bottlenecks in the recruiting process. Suggest measures for improving employee retention

values.text: Does this sound interesting to you?
Great! Let me brief you a little about your job role in the company.

As a Data Analyst, you should collect, organize and interpret statistical information to make it useful for a range of businesses and organizations, using data analysis tools. The meaningful results that you pull from the raw data will help your employers or clients to make important decisions by identifying various facts and trends.

options.label: using advanced computerised models to extract the data needed
performing initial analysis to assess the quality of the data
performing further analysis to determine the meaning of the data
performing final analysis to provide additional data screening
preparing reports based on analysis and presenting to management

values.text:
I am so sorry I could not help you find the Right Job for your Profile. But its my deep regret to inform you that the Company won't compromise with the salary, as its their policy "No Bargaining/Settlements Allowed".
Hope to see you here again, the next time you apply for a Job Role of your Choice !!!!
Thanks, for your Response. Its my pleasure to be of help to you.
I am so sorry for your response/reaction. I will try to be better next time and be of much more help to you.

generic.title: Thank You! Nice to speak to you.

Your Hiring Manager has good Critical thinking skills, he is collaborative, supportive and encourages and embraces his new as well as old employees as well. Treats everyone at the workspace equally, he is not bias at all. He has good leadership skills, hence his team is currently one of the best and the happiest in the company.
He has a very creative mind or thought process as you can say. He has good time management skills, hence he likes him employees to be the same( punctual and disciplined) just like him. He likes those employees who follow his rules and footsteps. He has a good customer service experience on his record.
Its just been a month since this job role profile has been open. As the recruiters are looking for a suitable candidate for this profile.

The 3 or 4 most important skills, a candidate should possess to be selected for this job role is : 
1. well-balanced personality
2. versatile nature
3. disciplined.
4. good communication skills.
5. loyal at work
6.practical thinker

It is a newly created job profile for the company you have chosen.
